snippet.textDisplay: Tied to a post on top of the tree by a rope -  post is out of frame. Pig walked off/fell off the top of the tree somehow. Now bouncing around like an idiot on a bungee cord and stuck under the tree, but above the ground. Rope no-clipping into the inside of the trees leaves. Very confusing photo, don't blame you.

snippet.textDisplay: @WaddleDooProductions I'm not a very big fan of fps. I do play all of those that you mentioned, but what they lack is the creativity that you can put forth in minecraft. When I'm playing minecraft, I feel like I'm actually in my worlds just roaming around. I'm able to create my future as I see it in minecraft. I don't just follow some storyline that the creator gives me. I'm free to pick my own destiny.
snippet.textOriginal: @WaddleDooProductions I'm not a very big fan of fps. I do play all of those that you mentioned, but what they lack is the creativity that you can put forth in minecraft. When I'm playing minecraft, I feel like I'm actually in my worlds just roaming around. I'm able to create my future as I see it in minecraft. I don't just follow some storyline that the creator gives me. I'm free to pick my own destiny.

snippet.textDisplay:
1: the "creepers" in the pic are zombies modified with a creeper skin.
2: creepers drop one of (currently) two records. the green record plays this song and the gold record plays "18", which is crap.
3: you need a music box to play records. craft it like a chest with a diamond in the middle.
4: creepers will ONLY drop a record if the hit that kills them is made by a skeleton, not you.
snippet.textOriginal:
1: the "creepers" in the pic are zombies modified with a creeper skin.
2: creepers drop one of (currently) two records. the green record plays this song and the gold record plays "18", which is crap.
3: you need a music box to play records. craft it like a chest with a diamond in the middle.
4: creepers will ONLY drop a record if the hit that kills them is made by a skeleton, not you.

snippet.textDisplay:
@AssasinKNR has a very good idea. :o
I just found out about this a little while ago, 'cause a friend told me to try it. I liked the free version well enough (although that does get old after a while). Alpha has a whole ton of features that Classic doesn't, so I'm thinking of getting it around Christmas time. x3
I love the simple, block style of the terrain and the creatures, it's cute. x3
I was planning on being completely passive if/when I got it, but if creepers drop this awesome music box...
snippet.textOriginal:
@AssasinKNR has a very good idea. :o
I just found out about this a little while ago, 'cause a friend told me to try it. I liked the free version well enough (although that does get old after a while). Alpha has a whole ton of features that Classic doesn't, so I'm thinking of getting it around Christmas time. x3
I love the simple, block style of the terrain and the creatures, it's cute. x3
